Activities.Name: Communication
Activities.Description: Start of project where stake holders gather and discuss project users, concepts, requirements and timelines

Activities.Name: Planning
Activities.Description: Timelines are establised.  Estimates provides and overall schedule is produced

Activities.Name: Modeling
Activities.Description: Project analysis and designs are produced, such as UML classes, activities, state transition, packaging and deployment models

Activities.Name: Construction
Activities.Description: Project code is completed based on input designs.  Other project collateral and deliverables are produced, such as help files, database and other static deliverables.  Test and QA is completed

Activities.Name: Deployment
Activities.Description: Project is released.  Project is deployed to marketing channels. Beta sites or complete installations are executed.
